reviews.review: pra quem curte esse genero sabe que esse jogo e fodão

I was today years old when I found out the important difference between the following (sarcasm)

Tunnelling: Killer is following and focusing on a single survivor that is running away across half the map, ocassionally jumping through window or palette and getting hooked at the end of chase.

Looping: Killer is following and focusing on a single survivor that is running away across half the map, ocassionally jumping through window or palette, but managing to survive because either killer gives up or survivors manage to get 4 gens up.
DBDSM, 'cause this game is for anyone who enjoy pain and suffering on yourself and others

Game is a 10/10.

It is easy to learn and easy to master. If you are looking for online competitive environement and you are sick of mainstream genre's like FPS's or MOBA's then this game is for you. Whether it is for killers or survivors the game is for the biggest part very balanced as it offers many playstyles whether you want to play killer or survivor.

I have spent quite a bit of time on this game and seen it evolved through the years and oh boy is it fun to play it today. 

For more casual players you can still play with your friends : even if you aren't super competitive the environement and the atmosphere that are set up in the game are great enough to make you enjoy the game with emotions like fear, adrenaline rush and fun!

What are you waiting for?
